entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East, including South Pass. * WHEN...From 8 AM Thursday to 6 AM MST Friday.

entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. Strongest gusts are expected along Outer Drive
